title: 90/7/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 December 1989 approving the programme of measures submitted by the Greek Government for 1990 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 15 December 1989
approving the programme of measures submitted by the Greek Government for 1990 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(90/7/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme of measures on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece submitted by the Greek Government for 1990 is approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1989.
For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 191, 23. 7. 1985, p. 53.
